dev.description:
Starts commands set for project development
As module accepts `cms` or `chatbot`

info.description: Shows info about CLI and Powerbot CMS project

init.description:
Creates directory and initializes Powerbot CMS inside.
As version you can use any release available on https://github.com/maxtomczyk/powerbot-cms/releases

module.description: Creates new component for CMS. Type paramter is `view` or `component`.

setup.description: Runs setup procedure like database import etc.

env:list.description: Lists environments for current project dir

env:set.description: Manages environments (database connection params) used for sync module.

env:unset.description: Removes selected environment data from system

language:add.description:
Helps to manage languages in Powerbot CMS
  As locale you have to provide valid Facebook locale like en_US

language:default.description: Sets passed language or locale to default

language:remove.description: Removes language support from your chatbot.

sync:attachments.description: Sync attachments table between two environments

sync:messages.description: Sync messsages and groups between environments
